summary: This small mod makes the hooded archmage robes worn by Savos Aren greybeard robes while retaining the unique archmage hood.
descriptionHtml:
Do you thin the hooded archmage robes worn by Archmage Savos Aren look funny and/or weird? Do you like playing with the unhooded archmage robes as a warm poncho for snow weather but don\'t want to archmage or a mage character? Then you have come to right place.

This small mod makes the hooded archmage robes worn by Savos Aren greybeard robes while retaining the unique archmage hood. This doesn\'t touch the unhooded robes that are found in the qasmoke room if youd like to wear those, like I do. no special install instructs its just a little esp and nothing more.


other vital winterhold mods-

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10746

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8333

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17417
author: frank zunge
